body: While raging, the barbarian may overrun more than one target per round, with a –2 penalty on her CMB for each overrun check after the first. A barbarian must have the overbearing advance rage power to select this rage power. A barbarian must be at least 6th level to select this rage power.
name: Overbearing Onslaught
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Barbarian/Rage Powers/Overbearing Onslaught
